title: Newly Renovated 1, 2, & 3 Bedroom Apartments, Outdoor Kitchen
posting_body: Want more information on this unit?
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 625 Sq.
Tucked in a quiet, residential neighborhood in the popular Dallas/Fort Worth suburb or Lewisville, Catalina provides a superb location between Lewisville Lake and Grapevine Lake.
Offering newly upgraded 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartment homes.
Relax in our shimmering swimming pool, stay healthy in our state-of-the-art fitness center, or walk your pet friends in our leash-free bark park!
With convenient access to I-35E and with a bus stop located just outside the community.
Catalina is ideal for commuting throughout the Metroplex.
Also minutes away from DFW airport.
Give us a call to schedule your tour today!
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a non-refundable pet fee of $300/pet.
There is also a $10/month pet rent per pet.
Unless used as an assistance animal, restricted dog breeds are prohibited.
